charges.charge_description: 18:371 CONSPIRACY TO COMMIT BANK FRAUD (Count 1: $250,000-5 yrs; S/A: $50; 3 years Supervised Release) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is sentenced on Count 1: $19,593.64 (restitution) joint and severely with Robert Murphy CR-3-96-108; S/A: $50; 3 years probation; 150 hours of community service over the course of probation; defendant to serve 2 months home confinement with electronic monitoring subject to release for class work; probation to be transferred when defendant relocates (1)
